title: Just what you're looking for! 1 Bed / 1 Bath. Scarlett Place
posting_body: ['Scarlett Place', '3500 Summercourt Dr', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '722 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1382', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Unit Includes:', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpeting', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Extra Storage', '◾ Oven', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Range', '◾ Refrigerator/Freezer', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Crown Molding', '◾ Deck', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Trash Compactor', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Property Description:', 'Welcome to Scarlett Place, a residential community featuring One, Two & Three bedroom apartments in Jonesboro, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apartment for rent in Jonesboro, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'Property Amenities:', '◾ Controlled Access', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Gated Community', '◾ Parking', '◾ Picnic Area', '◾ Pool', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Double Vanity', '◾ Garages', '◾ Garden Tubs', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Multi Use Room', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Sundeck', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '562B8D6B88794A78']
